Text: What the hell is dd, img writer says its no good
Thanks for this! I used it To Install Windows 95 and Found it very useful!

dd is the linux software used to produce .img files (or floppy from img).  

If you are having trouble, i suggest trying a different img writer..

You can copy the image file to disk drive A: using the MS-DOS "diskcopy" command.

DISKCOPY C:\Win98SE.img A:

Thanks for the care you take with the torrents you upload. This Floppy is the witness of your good will.

Best regards

robs
